forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 53. West southwest wind around 16 mph.

forecast.name: Wednesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny, with a high near 61. West wind 16 to 24 mph, with gusts as high as 28 mph.

weather_report:
As dawn breaks over Downtown San Francisco, a thick blanket of clouds hovers, heralding a cool morning with temperatures lingering softly around fifty-three degrees. The signature winds whip gently from the west-southwest at around sixteen miles per hour, offering a brisk reminder of the Bay's proximity to the sea. The forecast promises a beautiful shift as the day unfolds, giving way to mostly sunny skies and temperatures rising to a serene sixty-one degrees by afternoon. With the winds expected to pick up, those gusts could add a refreshing edge, reminiscent of the ocean's breath dancing across the hills.

Although the morning holds a certain mystique with its cloud cover, one cannot dismiss the subtle charm of the day ahead. The fog, a dance partner to the city’s iconic features, may linger only briefly before retreating, allowing the sun to cast warming rays upon the streets. Dressing in layers will be wise; a light jacket or cardigan shall provide comfort during the chill of the morning, transitioning to a more relaxed attire as the sun begins to assert itself. Given the conditions, today is an ideal opportunity for an invigorating stroll along the waterfront, or perhaps exploring one of the city's hidden cafes, where the scent of freshly brewed coffee mingles with the salty air. Enjoying the nuances of the day, however mundane, can bring a peaceful respite before the pulse of the evening rush returns.
